title: Mary Square Cream and Black Polka Dot Gold Tone 5.5 x 8 Spiral Wedding Planner
features: Gold tone foil embossed front cover with beautiful sentiment
Notebook measures approximately 8 x 5.5 inches; Made of vegan leatherette
Contains 100 wide ruled front and back pages for note taking and journaling
Stays fully opened on its own when in use
Just the right size to throw in your purse or tote for when you're on-the-go
description: Mary Square 5.5"X8" polka-dot spiral wedding planner. Mary Square is an emerging lifestyle brand named after the owners' grandmothers Mary and Mary. Our motto is "more than a gift" as our goal is to encourage you to live passionately and give with purpose, knowing that each gift makes a difference to the person you are sending it too. With everything from drinkware, stationery, accessories, clothing and many other gift items. From that very first product, it has always been about the significance of the gift rather than just the product itself. We have also partnered with world help to donate a portion of our profit on every product to help provide clean water to people worldwide.
